name: Adventure for a Bit
description:
Teach an AI named Bit to make a perfect procedural world. 

A casual experience of exploring the unknown, and talking for a bit.

A game by JUSTCAMH with music by ClockMaker

Part of the Care Package Bundle, get 7 wholesome games for $7

~1 hour of game

Recommended; A dedicated GPU + multicore CPU + 4GB memory
